elements.name: Hydrogen
elements.description: Hydrogen is a chemical element with symbol H and atomic number 1. Classified as a nonmetal, hydrogen is a gas at room temperature.

elements.name: Helium
elements.description: Helium is a chemical element with symbol He and atomic number 2. Classified as a noble gas, helium is a gas at room temperature.

elements.name: Lithium
elements.description: Lithium is a chemical element with symbol Li and atomic number 3. Classified as an alkali metal, lithium is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Beryllium
elements.description: Beryllium is a chemical element with symbol Be and atomic number 4. Classified as an alkaline earth metal, beryllium is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Boron
elements.description: Boron is a chemical element with symbol B and atomic number 5. Classified as a metalloid, boron is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Carbon
elements.description: Carbon is a chemical element with symbol C and atomic number 6. Classified as a nonmetal, carbon is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Nitrogen
elements.description: Nitrogen is a chemical element with symbol N and atomic number 7. Classified as a nonmetal, nitrogen is a gas at room temperature.

elements.name: Oxygen
elements.description: Oxygen is a chemical element with symbol O and atomic number 8. Classified as a nonmetal, oxygen is a gas at room temperature.

elements.name: Fluorine
elements.description: Fluorine is a chemical element with symbol F and atomic number 9. Classified as a halogen, fluorine is a gas at room temperature.

elements.name: Neon
elements.description: Neon is a chemical element with symbol Ne and atomic number 10. Classified as a noble gas, neon is a gas at room temperature.

elements.name: Sodium
elements.description: Sodium is a chemical element with symbol Na and atomic number 11. Classified as an alkali metal, sodium is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Magnesium
elements.description: Magnesium is a chemical element with symbol Mg and atomic number 12. Classified as an alkaline earth metal, magnesium is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Aluminum
elements.description: Aluminum is a chemical element with symbol Al and atomic number 13. Classified as a post-transition metal, aluminum is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Silicon
elements.description: Silicon is a chemical element with symbol Si and atomic number 14. Classified as a metalloid, silicon is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Phosphorus
elements.description: Phosphorus is a chemical element with symbol P and atomic number 15. Classified as a nonmetal, phosphorus is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Sulfur
elements.description: Sulfur is a chemical element with symbol S and atomic number 16. Classified as a nonmetal, sulfur is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Chlorine
elements.description: Chlorine is a chemical element with symbol Cl and atomic number 17. Classified as a halogen, chlorine is a gas at room temperature.

elements.name: Argon
elements.description: Argon is a chemical element with symbol Ar and atomic number 18. Classified as a noble gas, argon is a gas at room temperature.

elements.name: Potassium
elements.description: Potassium is a chemical element with symbol K and atomic number 19. Classified as an alkali metal, potassium is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Calcium
elements.description: Calcium is a chemical element with symbol Ca and atomic number 20. Classified as an alkaline earth metal, calcium is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Scandium
elements.description: Scandium is a chemical element with symbol Sc and atomic number 21. Classified as a transition metal, scandium is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Titanium
elements.description: Titanium is a chemical element with symbol Ti and atomic number 22. Classified as a transition metal, titanium is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Vanadium
elements.description: Vanadium is a chemical element with symbol V and atomic number 23. Classified as a transition metal, vanadium is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Chromium
elements.description: Chromium is a chemical element with symbol Cr and atomic number 24. Classified as a transition metal, chromium is a solid at room temperature.

elements.name: Manganese
elements.description: Manganese is a chemical element with symbol Mn and atomic number 25. Classified as a transition metal, manganese is a solid at room temperature.
